/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, adding a touch of green and urban architecture to the landscape. A few cars and pedestrians can be seen on the street, going about their day under the watchful eye of the sun.
